subject: Allowing maximum 10 days stay at Hotel to Officers/ Employees of NHAI on transfer in Public Interest -reg.
text: HRam 7zq <THRf giferazrut (Tew5 9Rdav &1k RTATf #ATT4,  #R TAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 774 Td 01-5 & 6, #qer-10, ERqFT, 7Ff fevit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TN/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Administration/2024 Policy Circular No.1.2.6.4/2024 dated July, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. ADMIN-11014/3/2024-0/0 GM (HR/ Admin-III) (Comp. No. 252002)} Sub: Allowing maximum 10 stay at Hotel to Officersl Employees of NHAI on transfer in Public Interest It has been decided that Officers/ Employees of NHAI, who transferred / posted from one place to another in Public Interest would be granted permission to stay in Hotel for a maximum period of 10 days during which they may arrange their accommodation at their new place of posting: The rates of Hotel accommodation shall be as per Circular No.NHAI/FGA/TA/2023 (E-5191) dated 12.07.2023 (as amended from time to time): 2 This facility will be admissible oly for a maximum period of 10 days and will not be extended under any condition whatsoever. However , this facility will not be admissible in case the transfer/ posting is made on the request of the Officer. 3 The Concerned Officers/ Finance Division at NHAI HQ ROs PIUs/ CMUs are requested to take necessary action in this matter. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 2567/24 (CS.
